name: Mechanic: repair of trains
description:
Want to become the best railway mechanic? You have such a wonderful opportunity. Introducing a new exciting game for kids - "Mechanic: repair trains." 
And so, you are a very experienced mechanic, who has at his disposal a whole railway depot and a real workshop, in which small funny locomotives get on a very complex overhaul. 
At your disposal is a huge set of tools, through which young professional repairmen have to repair broken trains. 
Your baby will need to carefully inspect the damaged train, and decide which tools will be used to repair the broken train. After all it can be not only external damages: various dents and rust, but and something other.
After your child finds all the malfunctions: cleans dirt and rust, straightens all dents and welds holes with welding, eliminates all internal damage, he will need to take care of the appearance of a funky train. And without painting here can not do. 
Choosing the most beautiful color, your young repairman takes over. At the end of everything - the kid chooses and pastes the most interesting and bright sticker, which will distinguish this children's train from others and make it the most beautiful and attractive. 
That's it. The repair is finished and your merry train is boundlessly grateful to you. He is again ready to set out on a journey to a fanny adventure. 
The game about trains for children is the best choice for you and your child, which will help you to have fun and exciting for parents and children together for more than one evening, will enthrall your child with an interesting plot, the beauty of graphics, the variety of types of trains.
Railway for kids is not just a game, but In the game, your child will be able to get new skills and knowledge and master a wonderful and interesting profession - the mechanics of railway trains.
